select
vs_name,connections,net_in,net_out,date_format(c_time,'%H:%i') time
vs_name,sum(connections) connections,sum(net_in) net_in, sum(net_out) net_out, date_format(c_time,'%H:%i') time
from t_f5_vs_stat where c_time >= #{startTime}

group by vs_name
,device_ip
,time

select count(id) count, client_ip,virtual_name,virtual_ip,virtual_pool_name,virtual_port,server_ip,server_port from t_request_log where insert_time >=#{startTime} and http_statcode >=399 group by client_ip

select count(id) count, client_ip, virtual_name, virtual_ip, virtual_pool_name, virtual_port, server_ip, server_port, avg(response_time) response_time, sum(response_size)/1024/8 response_size from t_request_log where insert_time >=#{startTime} and http_statcode <= 399 group by client_ip
